result.execSummary:
The defendant Eton S. Gladney was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Sex Offender - Fail/Update Information, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 301.45(4)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Consecutive to all previously imposed sentences in the place designated by law.
Costs rolled into sentence.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Eton S. Gladney

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Zach Brost appeared in person for the State.  Deft appeared (in custody) in court along w/Atty Hilary Edwards.  Sentencing arguments made.  Deft sentenced to 9mos consec to all previously imposed sentences in the place designated by law.  Costs rolled into sentence.  Appeal rights.  Firearm warning.  Voting acknowledgment.  NOTE - deft was revoked on a previous ES case.
due to ongoing jury trial, sentencing hrg moved to 3/16/21 @ 2pm; confirming email sent

Minutes:  Proceedings conducted via Zoom.  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Deft appeared (in custody) via Zoom.  Atty Hilary Edwards appeared on behalf of the deft via Zoom.  Case is resolved.  Repeater ehancer dismissed on State's motion.  Deft pleads guilty; found guilty by the Court.  PSI ordered.  Sentencing set for 1/11/21 @ 2pm.

Minutes:  Hybrid hrg.  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Zach Brost appeared for the State.  Deft appeared (in custody) via Zoom.  Atty Hilary Edwards appeared on behalf of deft.  Atty Edwards reports the case is settled - has not gone over the plea form w/deft.  Plea hrg set for 10/30/20 @ 11:30am.
